title: Chainlink External Adapter for Solana-view-function
description: The Solana view function adapter can be used to query account information from the Solana blockchain

LCD_URL.description: The RPC URL to a Solana node. Options include `https://api.devnet.solana.com`, `https://api.testnet.solana.com`, `https://api.mainnet-beta.solana.com`, `https://solana-api.projectserum.com`. Full list can be found here https://docs.solana.com/cluster/rpc-endpoints.
